Subskills.name: Guardian Angels
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by fist of the heavens.

Subskills.name: Divine Explosion
Subskills.description: Fist of heavens grows in size according to the amount of projectiles shocking the ground dealing damage in an increased area of effect radius.

Subskills.name: Punish the Sinners
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict arcane break on hit.

Subskills.name: Trust in Faith
Subskills.description: Decreases fist of the heavens mana cost.

Subskills.name: Heaven's Wrath
Subskills.description: Holy bolts now return back to the point of impact dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Heaven's Might
Subskills.description: Chance to stun target on hit.

Subskills.name: Divine Reach
Subskills.description: Increases cast rate when using fist of the heavens.

Subskills.name: Tiring Combat
Subskills.description: Summon multiple smaller fist of the heavens orbiting you and unleashing holy bolts on hit.

Subskills.name: Crusader of Heavens
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to summon an additional fist.

Subskills.name: Blessed One
Subskills.description: Fist of the heavens no longer fires holy bolts. Instead unleash a holy nova scaling its damage based on projectile amount.

Subskills.name: Forceful Salvation
Subskills.description: Unleash the fist towards target location pulsating holy bolts as it travels and then returns back to you.

Subskills.name: Immaculate Warrior
Subskills.description: Smash with the fist dealing increased damage based on projectile amount inflicting arcane break and knocking back targets.
